pkgmetadata.longdescription: # cvat-manifest-builder## Installation & Use```shell# Install cvat-manifest-builder> pip install cvat-manifest-builder> cvat-manifest-builder --helpusage: cvat-manifest-builder [-h] --output_manifest_file OUTPUT_MANIFEST_FILE --input_data_path INPUT_DATA_PATHBuilds a CVAT manifest file from a directory of images.optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --output_manifest_file OUTPUT_MANIFEST_FILE Path to the output manifest file. --input_data_path INPUT_DATA_PATH Path to the data directory.```
